title: MealMaster
description: A recipe and meal planning application that generates personalized menus based on dietary preferences.
introduction: MealMaster is an innovative solution for home cooks and health enthusiasts alike, designed to simplify meal planning and grocery shopping. By leveraging AI and user preferences, the app creates tailored meal plans that cater to diverse dietary needs, making cooking easier and more enjoyable for everyone.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: The idea for MealMaster was born out of a common struggle: deciding what to cook each day while accommodating varying dietary preferences. We wanted to create an app that not only simplifies meal planning but also makes it enjoyable. By combining AI-powered recommendations with user input, we aimed to build a tool that caters to everyone's needs, whether they're vegan, gluten-free, or following a keto diet.

sections.title: Prototype Development
sections.body: We started by developing a basic prototype using React Native for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. The initial version allowed users to input their dietary preferences and generate a weekly meal plan. We also integrated a core algorithm that pulled recipes from a small database. This prototype helped us validate the concept and gather early feedback from potential users.

sections.title: Overcoming Initial Challenges
sections.body: One of the biggest challenges was developing an algorithm that could handle multiple dietary restrictions while still providing varied and appealing meal options. We addressed this by expanding our recipe database and refining the algorithm to prioritize diversity and nutritional balance. We also implemented a user-friendly interface that made it easy to input preferences and view meal plans.

sections.title: Current Features
sections.body: MealMaster now offers a robust set of features, including personalized meal plans, a grocery list generator, and social sharing options. The app also includes a recipe library with step-by-step instructions and high-quality images. We've integrated machine learning to continuously improve the algorithm based on user feedback and preferences. Additionally, we've added real-time updates to ensure users always have access to the latest recipes and features.

sections.title: Future Plans
sections.body: Looking ahead, we plan to expand MealMaster's capabilities by integrating AI-driven meal planning, allowing users to input ingredients they already have and generate recipes based on those items. We also aim to add a community feature where users can share their own recipes and cooking tips. Finally, we're exploring partnerships with grocery delivery services to make the app even more convenient for users.
